title: In-Depth Social Studies Project Design Using Personalized Learning Agents

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners, affiliated with vocational training institutions, participate in tasks analyzing social phenomena and performing projects in a VR simulation environment. Significant variations exist in individual learning paces and interests.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and summarize OER (Open Educational Resources) materials using a personalized agent and achieve 80% or more of their learning objectives
Learners can accurately explain 90% or more of social concepts using quizzes and flashcards generated by an agent

Learners will analyze given social phenomenon datasets using visual analysis tools for agents (Gephi, NodeXL, etc.) and submit deliverables visualizing ≥3 key causal relationships with VR simulation tools (CoSpaces, Unity, etc.).
Learners revise and improve project deliverables two or more times according to agent feedback through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
